entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Altona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
